resources.string: Welcome to the UEA Room Finder! This page will give you a quick rundown on how to use this app to find a specific room at UEA. Simply follow the steps below:

To tell the app which room youd like directions to, begin typing the name of the room (for example, James Platt Language Centre) and a suggestion will pop up. Tap the correct suggestion and press the "SEARCH" button. This will save the selected location as your destination.

string.name: finding
string.u: MAKING YOUR WAY TO THE ROOM

resources.string: To get directions to the building, tap the first button . The route to the selected room will now be displayed as a line on the map. If you wish to change the directions from the view of a map to a list of text instructions, tap the second button. To view information about the room you searched tap the third button.
NOTE: If you have the app running while making your way to the room, the app will give you a notification when you are near your destination!
